mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.POSITION_ID ,A.MEMBER_ID,A.APPLY_STATUS,P.POSITION_NAME ,P.POSITION_INFO ,P.POSITION_DUE_DATE ,P.POSITION_OPEN_DATE ,P.POSITION_STATUS,C.COMPANY_NAME,MC.MID_CATEGORY_NAME FROM TBL_APPLY A JOIN TBL_POSITION P ON A.POSITION_ID = P.ID JOIN TBL_COMPANY C ON P.COMPANY_ID = C.ID JOIN TBL_MID_CATEGORY MC ON P.MID_CATEGORY_ID = MC.ID WHERE A.MEMBER_ID = #{id} ORDER BY A.POSITION_ID
